content:
TITLE: Defining Python Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Python code. It includes classes for keywords, built-ins, numbers, strings, comments, decorators, functions, classes, and their components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
built_in         built-in objects (None, False, True and Ellipsis)
number           number
string           string (of any type)
comment          comment
decorator        @-decorator for functions
function         function header "def some_name(...):"
class            class header "class SomeName(...):"
title            name of a function or a class inside a header
params           everything inside parentheses in a function's or class' header
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining JavaScript Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for JavaScript code. It includes classes for keywords, comments, numbers, literals, strings, regular expressions, functions, and function parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
comment          comment
number           number
literal          special literal: "true", "false" and "null"
string           string
regexp           regular expression
function         header of a function
title            name of a function inside a header
params           parentheses and everything inside them in a function's header
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining HTML/XML Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for HTML and XML markup. It includes classes for tags, attributes, values, comments, processing instructions, doctype declarations, and CDATA sections.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: xml
CODE:
```
tag              any tag from "<" till ">"
attribute        tag's attribute with or without value
value            attribute's value
comment          comment
pi               processing instruction (<? ... ?>)
doctype          <!DOCTYPE ... > declaration
cdata            CDATA section
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Java Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Java code. It includes classes for keywords, numbers, strings, comments, annotations, Javadoc comments, class headers, and inheritance keywords.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_19

LANGUAGE: java
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
number           number
string           string
comment          commment
annotaion        annotation
javadoc          javadoc comment
class            class header from "class" till "{"
title            class name inside a header
params           everything in parentheses inside a class header
inheritance      keywords "extends" and "implements" inside class header
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining C++ Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for C++ code. It includes classes for keywords, numbers, strings, comments, preprocessor directives, and STL container instantiations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_20

LANGUAGE: cpp
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
number           number
string           string and character
comment          comment
preprocessor     preprocessor directive
stl_container    instantiation of STL containers ("vector<...>")
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining CSS Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for CSS code. It includes classes for selectors, at-rules, attribute selectors, pseudo-classes, comments, rules, properties, values, and various value types.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
tag              tag in selectors
id               #some_name in selectors
class            .some_name in selectors
at_rule          @-rule till first "{" or ";"
attr_selector    attribute selector (square brackets in a[href^=http://])
pseudo           pseudo classes and elemens (:after, ::after etc.)
comment          comment
rules            everything from "{" till "}"
attribute        property name inside a rule
value            property value inside a rule, from ":" till ";" or
                 till the end of rule block
number           number within a value
string           string within a value
hexcolor         hex color (#FFFFFF) within a value
function         CSS function within a value
important        "!important" symbol
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining PHP Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for PHP code. It includes classes for keywords, numbers, strings, comments, PHPDoc tags, variables, and preprocessor marks.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: php
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
number           number
string           string (of any type)
comment          comment
phpdoc           phpdoc params in comments
variable         variable starting with "$"
preprocessor     preprocessor marks: "<?php" and "?>"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Go Language Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Go language code. It includes classes for comments, strings, numbers, keywords, constants, type names, and built-in functions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: go
CODE:
```
comment          comment
string           string constant
number           number
keyword          language keywords
constant         true false nil iota
typename         built-in plain types (int, string etc.)
built_in         built-in functions
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Ruby Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Ruby code. It includes classes for keywords, strings, substitutions, comments, YARD tags, functions, classes, and symbols.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
string           string
subst            in-string substitution (#{...})
comment          comment
yardoctag        YARD tag
function         function header "def some_name(...):"
class            class header "class SomeName(...):"
title            name of a function or a class inside a header
parent           name of a parent class
symbol           symbol
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining C# Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for C# code. It includes classes for keywords, numbers, strings, comments, and XML documentation tags.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_23

LANGUAGE: cs
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
number           number
string           string
comment          commment
xmlDocTag        xmldoc tag ("///", "<!--", "-->", "<..>")
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Scala Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Scala code. It includes classes for keywords, numbers, strings, comments, annotations, Javadoc comments, class headers, and inheritance keywords.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: scala
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
number           number
string           string
comment          comment
annotation       annotation
javadoc          javadoc comment
javadoctag       @-tag in javadoc
class            class header
title            class name inside a header
params           everything in parentheses inside a class header
inheritance      keywords "extends" and "with" inside class header
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining CoffeeScript Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for CoffeeScript code. It includes classes for keywords, comments, numbers, literals, strings, regular expressions, functions, classes, and properties.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: coffeescript
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
comment          comment
number           number
literal          special literal: "true", "false" and "null"
string           string
regexp           regular expression
function         header of a function
class            header of a class
title            name of a function variable inside a header
params           parentheses and everything inside them in a function's header
property         @-property within class and functions
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Objective-C Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Objective-C code. It includes classes for keywords, built-in Cocoa/Cocoa Touch constants and classes, numbers, strings, comments, preprocessor directives, class declarations, and property accessors.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_21

LANGUAGE: objectivec
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
built_in         Cocoa/Cocoa Touch constants and classes
number           number
string           string
comment          comment
preprocessor     preprocessor directive
class            interface/implementation, protocol and forward class declaration
variable         properties and struct accesors
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Perl Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Perl code. It includes classes for keywords, comments, numbers, strings, regular expressions, subroutines, variables, operators, and POD documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: perl
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
comment          comment
number           number
string           string
regexp           regular expression
sub              subroutine header (from "sub" till "{")
variable         variable starting with "$", "%", "@"
operator         operator
pod              plain old doc
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Lua Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Lua code. It includes classes for keywords, numbers, strings, comments, built-in operators, functions, and multiline strings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_17

LANGUAGE: lua
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
number           number
string           string
comment          comment
built_in         built-in operator
function         header of a function
title            name of a function inside a header
params           everything inside parentheses in a function's header
long_brackets    multiline string in [=[ .. ]=]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining D Language Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for D language code. It includes classes for comments, strings, numbers, keywords, constants, and built-in types.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_24

LANGUAGE: d
CODE:
```
comment          comment
string           string constant
number           number
keyword          language keywords (including @attributes)
constant         true false null
built_in         built-in plain types (int, string etc.)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining ActionScript Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for ActionScript code. It includes classes for comments, strings, numbers, keywords, literals, reserved words, declarations, preprocessor directives, types, packages, classes, functions, and parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: actionscript
CODE:
```
comment          comment
string           string
number           number
keyword          keywords
literal          literal
reserved         reserved keyword
title            name of declaration (package, class or function)
preprocessor     preprocessor directive (import, include)
type             type of returned value (for functions)
package          package (named or not)
class            class/interface
function         function
param            params of function
rest_arg         rest argument of function
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Django Template Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Django templates. It includes classes for HTML tags, comments, doctype declarations, attributes, template tags, variables, filters, and arguments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: django
CODE:
```
keyword          HTML tag in HTML, default tags and default filters in templates
tag              any tag from "<" till ">"
comment          comment
doctype          <!DOCTYPE ... > declaration
attribute        tag's attribute with or withou value
value            attribute's value
template_tag     template tag {% .. %}
variable         template variable {{ .. }}
template_comment template comment, both {# .. #} and {% comment %}
filter           filter from "|" till the next filter or the end of tag
argument         filter argument
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Vala Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Vala code. It includes classes for keywords, numbers, strings, comments, class definitions, and constants.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_22

LANGUAGE: vala
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
number           number
string           string
comment          comment
class            class definitions
title            in class definition
constant         ALL_UPPER_CASE
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Delphi Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Delphi code. It includes classes for keywords, comments, numbers, strings, functions, procedures, constructors, destructors, and classes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: delphi
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
comment          comment (of any type)
number           number
string           string
function         header of a function, procedure, constructor and destructor
title            name of a function, procedure, constructor or destructor
                 inside a header
params           everything inside parentheses in a function's header
class            class' body from "= class" till "end;"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining JSON Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for JSON data. It includes classes for numbers, literals, strings, object property names, and property values.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
number           number
literal          "true", "false" and "null"
string           string value
attribute        name of an object property
value            value of an object property
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Markdown Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Markdown markup. It includes classes for headers, list bullets, emphasis, strong emphasis, blockquotes, code blocks, horizontal rules, and links.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
header            header
bullet            list bullet
emphasis          emphasis
strong            strong emphasis
blockquote        blockquote
code              code
horizontal_rule   horizontal rule
link_label        link label
link_url          link url
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining HTTP Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for HTTP requests and responses. It includes classes for request lines, status lines, header names, header values, and status codes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_16

LANGUAGE: http
CODE:
```
request          first line of a request
status           first line of a response
attribute        header name
string           header value or query string in a request line
number           status code
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining VBScript Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for VBScript code. It includes classes for keywords, numbers, strings, comments, and built-in functions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: vbscript
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
number           number
string           string
comment          comment
built_in         built-in function
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Python Profiler Results Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for Python profiler results. It includes classes for numbers, strings, built-in functions, filenames, summaries, headers, keywords, functions, and prompts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
number           number
string           string
builtin          builtin function entry
filename         filename in an entry
summary          profiling summary
header           header of table of results
keyword          column header
function         function name in an entry (including parentheses)
title            actual name of a function in an entry (excluding parentheses)
prompt           interpreter prompt (>>> or ...)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining RenderMan RSL Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for RenderMan RSL (Shading Language) code. It includes classes for keywords, numbers, strings, comments, preprocessor directives, shader keywords, shading keywords, and built-in functions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_25

LANGUAGE: rsl
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
number           number
string           string (including @"..")
comment          comment
preprocessor     preprocessor directive
shader           sahder keywords
shading          shading keywords
built_in         built-in function
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining RenderMan RIB Syntax Highlighting Classes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the syntax highlighting classes for RenderMan RIB (Interface Bytestream) code. It includes a class for keywords.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/storm-site/blob/asf-site/content/releases/1.2.4/javadocs/classref.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_26

LANGUAGE: rib
CODE:
```
keyword          keyword
```
